scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Be My Guest' (continued).
Dramatic dialogue sequence between Nerissa Ravencroft and Takanashi Kiara in a gothic castle courtyard.

subtitles.original: ...bound to be my guest
subtitles.english: ...bound to be my guest

subtitles.original: Yo!
subtitles.english: Yo!

subtitles.original: Demon!
subtitles.english: Demon!

subtitles.original: How dare you kill an innocent?
subtitles.english: How dare you kill an innocent?

subtitles.original: Excuse me?
subtitles.english: Excuse me?

subtitles.original: I've done no such thing.
subtitles.english: I've done no such thing.

subtitles.original: Innocent?
subtitles.english: Innocent?

subtitles.original: I would hardly call a witch who lives for power
subtitles.english: I would hardly call a witch who lives for power

subtitles.original: and binds my kind for her own purposes innocent.
subtitles.english: and binds my kind for her own purposes innocent.

subtitles.original: Innocent?
subtitles.english: Innocent?

subtitles.original: The very idea is laughable.
subtitles.english: The very idea is laughable.

subtitles.original: Leave.
subtitles.english: Leave.

subtitles.original: I have no quarrel with you, so go now in peace
subtitles.english: I have no quarrel with you, so go now in peace

subtitles.original: before I change my mind.
subtitles.english: before I change my mind.

subtitles.original: A small token for your past bravery and trials.
subtitles.english: A small token for your past bravery and trials.

subtitles.original: How gracious.
subtitles.english: How gracious.

subtitles.original: Don't think I can't see straight through your ploys though.
subtitles.english: Don't think I can't see straight through your ploys though.

subtitles.original: You will not escape justice.
subtitles.english: You will not escape justice.

subtitles.original: Not this time.
subtitles.english: Not this time.

subtitles.original: You have brought this fight on yourself through your actions, demon.
subtitles.english: You have brought this fight on yourself through your actions, demon.

subtitles.original: You have brought all of this on yourself.
subtitles.english: You have brought all of this on yourself.

subtitles.original: For what?
subtitles.english: For what?

subtitles.original: For killing a mere witch?
subtitles.english: For killing a mere witch?

subtitles.original: She was not just a witch!
subtitles.english: She was not just a witch!

subtitles.original: She was my friend!
subtitles.english: She was my friend!

subtitles.original: And a kind-hearted person.
subtitles.english: And a kind-hearted person.

subtitles.original: And you killed her
subtitles.english: And you killed her

subtitles.original: in cold blood.
subtitles.english: in cold blood.

subtitles.original: Oh, the legendary Phoenix,
subtitles.english: Oh, the legendary Phoenix,

subtitles.original: the mighty fiery Kiara,
subtitles.english: the mighty fiery Kiara,

subtitles.original: friends with a witch?
subtitles.english: friends with a witch?

subtitles.original: It's almost funny.
subtitles.english: It's almost funny.

subtitles.original: Did you not realize?
subtitles.english: Did you not realize?

subtitles.original: It was your witch friend who freed me.
subtitles.english: It was your witch friend who freed me.

subtitles.original: Liar!
subtitles.english: Liar!

subtitles.original: She would never do such a ghastly thing.
subtitles.english: She would never do such a ghastly thing.

subtitles.original: I trust she would stay away from the dark magics and demonic rituals.
subtitles.english: I trust she would stay away from the dark magics and demonic rituals.

subtitles.original: To suggest otherwise is just another one of your dark lies.
subtitles.english: To suggest otherwise is just another one of your dark lies.

subtitles.original: She didn't deserve to die.
subtitles.english: She didn't deserve to die.

subtitles.original: Ah, poor Phoenix.
subtitles.english: Ah, poor Phoenix.

subtitles.original: Still so trusting of those around you
subtitles.english: Still so trusting of those around you

subtitles.original: and unable to see through their deceptions.
subtitles.english: and unable to see through their deceptions.

subtitles.original: Your kind spirit constantly deceives you.
subtitles.english: Your kind spirit constantly deceives you.

subtitles.original: That witch was never your friend.
subtitles.english: That witch was never your friend.

subtitles.original: We all know they cannot be trusted.
subtitles.english: We all know they cannot be trusted.

subtitles.original: Even after all these years, you still have not changed.
subtitles.english: Even after all these years, you still have not changed.

subtitles.original: Still believing in lies and still so easily misled.
subtitles.english: Still believing in lies and still so easily misled.

subtitles.original: Still such a fool.
subtitles.english: Still such a fool.

subtitles.original: It is you who is the fool,
subtitles.english: It is you who is the fool,

subtitles.original: demon!
subtitles.english: demon!

subtitles.original: Your lust for love and attention continues to lead you down the path of death and destruction.
subtitles.english: Your lust for love and attention continues to lead you down the path of death and destruction.

subtitles.original: And you don't even see that you're the one destroying your own happiness.
subtitles.english: And you don't even see that you're the one destroying your own happiness.

subtitles.original: The Gods were right to confine you there.
subtitles.english: The Gods were right to confine you there.

subtitles.original: You, who are still shackled by your lust for love,
subtitles.english: You, who are still shackled by your lust for love,

subtitles.original: your desire for attention,
subtitles.english: your desire for attention,

subtitles.original: your desire to be worshipped!
subtitles.english: your desire to be worshipped!

subtitles.original: I am the Demon of Sound!
subtitles.english: I am the Demon of Sound!

subtitles.original: How dare you speak to me in such a manner.
subtitles.english: How dare you speak to me in such a manner.

subtitles.original: It is but right that all should worship me on their knees.
subtitles.english: It is but right that all should worship me on their knees.

subtitles.original: Their love for none but myself.
subtitles.english: Their love for none but myself.

subtitles.original: Leave!
subtitles.english: Leave!

subtitles.original: I have heard enough of your falsities.
subtitles.english: I have heard enough of your falsities.

subtitles.original: This is your last warning.
subtitles.english: This is your last warning.

subtitles.original: Go now, or you'll be left to rot here forever!
subtitles.english: Go now, or you'll be left to rot here forever!

subtitles.original: I am not afraid of you,
subtitles.english: I am not afraid of you,

subtitles.original: and I will heed no such warning.
subtitles.english: and I will heed no such warning.

subtitles.original: Listen, and listen well, demon.
subtitles.english: Listen, and listen well, demon.

subtitles.original: I will not allow you to claim any more victims.
subtitles.english: I will not allow you to claim any more victims.

subtitles.original: To be banished in a void was not sufficient enough punishment for you.
subtitles.english: To be banished in a void was not sufficient enough punishment for you.

subtitles.original: No.
subtitles.english: No.

subtitles.original: Now, I will finish what the Gods should have.
subtitles.english: Now, I will finish what the Gods should have.

subtitles.original: Come on get moving cause now I'm on a roll oh
subtitles.english: Come on get moving cause now I'm on a roll oh

subtitles.original:
CH4NGE
Music: Giga Lyrics: q*Left
English Translyrics: Aries Shepard
subtitles.english:
CH4NGE
Music: Giga Lyrics: q*Left
English Translyrics: Aries Shepard

subtitles.original: One chance to choose it so what would you wager up above below
subtitles.english: One chance to choose it so what would you wager up above below

subtitles.original: You either win or not, can't ever be a draw
subtitles.english: You either win or not, can't ever be a draw

subtitles.original: Uh uh uh yeah, open the curtains up
subtitles.english: Uh uh uh yeah, open the curtains up

subtitles.original: My luck's not running, lacking money, looking for a sticker sticker
subtitles.english: My luck's not running, lacking money, looking for a sticker sticker

subtitles.original: Acting funny, asking if I'm winning with a... huh?
subtitles.english: Acting funny, asking if I'm winning with a... huh?

subtitles.original: Make your bets black or red chips to spend yeah yeah yeah yeah
subtitles.english: Make your bets black or red chips to spend yeah yeah yeah yeah

subtitles.original: Raise the stakes play that ace risk your life on a single game
subtitles.english: Raise the stakes play that ace risk your life on a single game

subtitles.original: Stay with me all will change you'll see not here to play
subtitles.english: Stay with me all will change you'll see not here to play

subtitles.original: Don't get in my way I'm tired of talking
subtitles.english: Don't get in my way I'm tired of talking

subtitles.original: COUNTER!
subtitles.english: COUNTER!

subtitles.original: Sit down sit down
subtitles.english: Sit down sit down
